ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The 3D Point Cloud chart demo shows how to create a real-time 3D point cloud
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Realtime 3D Point Cloud demo shows how to use the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ScatterRenderableSeries3D.html']ScatterRenderableSeries3D[/url] type to render a 3D Point-Cloud chart with two-dimensional textures.
The Point-Cloud chart provides a high performance solution suitable for many thousands or hundreds of thousands of 3D markers, useful for particle physics visualisation, Ion-optics or NBody simulations.
Scatter points can be colored individually, programmatically selected and scaled using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class. PointMetadata also allows you to tag individual scatter points with a business object of any type.
